name: Color Shift (Sheldon Chong)
description:
Color Shift is a 2D scroller arcade game with a twist to the 'avoid all obstacles' challenge. Instead of dodging all obstacles, you gain points by passing through them, as it's the right color!

Controls

Use the [A] and [D] key or [Left Arrow] and [Right Arrow] to move left and right

Use [Spacebar] to jump

How to play

There are 2 color states, red and blue. You gain a point for passing through an object that matches your color, but lose a heart when passing through an object of a different color. Once all 5 hearts are gone, it's game over

When you pass through a dark-colored object, you will lose a heart

By going through a portal, you switch between the red and blue state depending on the portal's color
